arts.ttl: Kevin Denkey absent for Cercle Brugge amid Lille links
arts.sum: Kevin Denkey (23) missed Cercle Brugge’s defeat to Anderlecht on Sunday. Pre-match, the Belgian club confirmed that the Togolese striker was absent as he was in talks to complete a…

arts.ttl: Nice equalizes deep into stoppage time against Lille in French league
arts.sum: Midfielder Tom Louchet scored six minutes into second-half stoppage time to earn Nice a 2-2 home draw with Lille in the French league on Sunday. Lille took the lead in the 17th minute when 19-year-old Belgian forward Matias Fernandez-Pardo broke free down the left and scored past goalkeeper Marcin Bulka.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | OGC Nice 2-2 Lille: Tom Louchet’s last-gasp equaliser sees spoils shared

arts.ttl: Bellingham on goal drought: 'I've been too nice'
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham blamed a change in his Real Madrid role for his lack of goals this season after scoring his first of the campaign on Saturday.
